text:
Saya dan keluarga menginap hanya 1 malam di Vega Hotel dengan memanfaatkan promo Family of Four. Kamar sudah saya booking sejak 2 minggu sebelumnya dan waktu booking dijanjikan kamar (king-sizs bed + extra bed) dengan view swimming pool. Kenyataannya ketika saya check-in, saya dialokasikan di kamar tanpa extra bed dan view tempat parkir.

Saya langsung komplain ke front office dan alasan mereka karena waktu itu hanya kamar tersebut yang ready. Yang mana menurut saya sangat tidak profesional karena saya sudah booking kamar dari 2 minggu sebelumnya dan keadaan tamu di hotel sedang sepi karena situasi COVID-19 (dilihat dari keadaan tempat parkir yang lowong dan aktifitas di hotel yang sepi).

Sekitar 30 menit kemudian saya dipindahkan ke kamar lain sesuai dengan apa yang dijanjikan sebelumnya. Akan tetapi, begitu masuk ke kamar yang baru, terdengar suara tukang bangunan sedang bekerja merenovasi kamar lain di sekitar kamar saya. Terdengar jelas sekali suara palu dipukulkan berulang-ulang ke dinding. Sangat mengganggu sekali!

Waktu malam pun, sekitar pukul 11 malam, tiba-tiba terdengar suara orang menyanyi dengan suara keras yang sangat mengganggu waktu istirahat malam. Ketika saya menghubungi front office, mereka mengatakan bahwa ada acara live acoustic music di lantai dasar. Saya komplain bahwa ini waktu istirahat bagi tamu dan bagaimana bisa kami beristirahat jika terdengar suara bising? Acara live music di lantai dasar tapi kami bisa mendengarnya dari kamar kami di lantai 3!!! Butuh 2x komplain ke front office dan sekitar 30 menit kemudian (hampir pukul 12 malam!) barulah acara live music tidak terdengar lagi dari kamar kami.

Untuk varietas makanan cukup bagus karena tersedia banyak pilihan (mix western & Indonesian style). Tetapi dari segi rasa menurut saya & keluarga, tidak ada yang spesial. Biasa saja.

Pelayanan staff sangat ramah & cekatan untuk bagian HK dan F&B.

Jika Anda ingin menginap di Vega Hotel, yang patut diperhitungkan adalah lokasinya yang dekat dengan bandara, ada fasilitas swimming pool, fitness center, dan spa. Tetapi sebelum Anda booking kamar, sebaiknya ditanyakan apakah akan ada acara live music di waktu yang sama dengan Anda menginap. Karena jika ada, itu akan mengganggu waktu istirahat Anda.
title: Susah tidur waktu malam karena acara live music!!

owner_response.text:
Dear Ibu Lia, 

Salam hangat dari Vega Hotel Sorong, 

Terima kasih telah menyempatkan waktu untuk memberikan ulasan tentang hotel kami. kami mengerti dengan kekecewaan yang ibu alami dengan keluarga selama masa menginap dan kami mohon maaf untuk hal tersebut.. feedback yang sudah disampaikan telah kami tindak lanjuti dengan tim agar hal serupa tidak terjadi lagi dikemudian hari. 
Tetapi ijinkan saya untuk mengklarifikasi beberapa hal yang menjadi perhatian ibu, mengenai alokasi kamar dengan spesifik view bisa kita akomodir sesuai dengan ketersediaan. kegagalan dari kami adalah lambat menginformasikan lebih awal bahwa kami sedang melakukan project renovasi di semua kamar dengan view kolam. memang occupancy tidak tinggi pada saat itu, tetapi jumlah kamar dengan tipe deluxe yang tersedia tidak banyak. kedua, kami mohon maaf atas keterlambatan extra bed set up di kamar. ketiga, memang betul pada tanggal 24 maret 2020 pada saat anda menginap, kami membuka live karaoke berdasarkan permintaan tamu yang sedang berulang tahun pada hari tersebut. kami mencoba sebisa mungkin mengakomodir permintaan tamu yang beragam tanpa mengurangi kenyamanannya. live music yang reguler karena pandemi covid 19 ini sudah kami stop  sejak tanggal 18 Maret 2020. kemudian kami melihat pengaturan kamar sudah diposisikan dengan view jalan/parkir dengan harapan tidak akan terganggu dengan suara musik.
kami mohon maaf untuk penyampaian komunikasi yang kurang tepat dari tim kami dan tentunya hal ini akan lebih kami perhatikan lagi ke depannya. semoga hal tersebut tidak menjadikan pengalaman terakhir anda menginap di Vega Hotel dan bisa saya pastikan seluruh tim akan melayani jauh lebih baik. 


Salam, 
Novi yasmiandini

text:
I corresponded with the VEGA HOTEL several times before my early morning arrival. When I finally arrived at 6:30 a.m. after traveling for two days the front desk staff gave me a hard time. They said I had given them a different arrival time, even though I had the emails to prove that I hadn't.
Then, they put me in a room that stunk like smoke and had an ashtray in it, even though I specified nonsmoking.
The final straw was when I checked my credit card statement and saw that they had charged me twice!!!!
I had been out in Raja Ampat (fabulous experience) and returned to Sorong but stayed in a different hotel based on my experience during my first stay.
I screenshot my statement. took it in and showed the girl (the same one who had checked me in) and she argued with me even when I showed her the exchange rates and how they didn't add up.
I was told that they would be in touch, they weren't, I emailed them. They got back and said they would review their accounts.
Two weeks passed, no word.
 I contacted the agency that I booked through and finally, almost two months later received my refund. There are not a lot of options in Sorong but there are other hotels that are much more hospital.
On my return trip I stayed at Fave and it was great!
title: Better choices available

text:
This is a very good hotel 5 minutes from the airport and only a couple of minor things could be improved.
Sorong is not a place many people visit and most often a place tourists visit en-route to Raja Ampet however we were there on business.
Room was excellent very comfortable and clean, the exception being the inside of the bathroom door which often gets overlooked, it was not dirty but did not get wiped daily. The only complaint with the room was there was no refrigerator which is a joke in this climate, there is a kettle and the usual quantity of sachets and as much as I love tea a cold drink is pretty much essential. The aircon was excellent to my annoyance as the wife always sets it as low as it will go surprising as she is Indonesian and I needed a cover on the bed to sleep.
The lifts are a bit "special" to say the least, they are excellent lifts except the indicator tells you a different floor to the one you are on , "2" for instance is the 3rd floor and "3" the 5th, "G" is the roof .Good wi-fi with friendly staff and while I was there the pool was clean.
I enjoyed breakfast , variety of Asian foods, cereals,  pancakes variety of fruit and salads along with cake, only the ground floor restaurant was open during my stay due to the roof being used for a function and whereas there is no complaint about the food I should note the full menu was not available.
All in all I would gladly stay again but would seriously suggest fridges are put in rooms.
title: Very good hotel [could be a little better]

text:
I booked a room to stay with my family as an escape holiday in Sorong. I booked 2 weeks before the check-in date and was told that we will get a room with a king-size bed plus an extra bed and a swimming pool view. But when we checked in, we got a room with only king-size bed (no extra bed) and a parking lot view. I suddenly call the front office and they told me that it was the only room available at that time and the room with a swimming pool wasn't ready by the time I checked in. They suddenly ask me to wait while they prepare the promised room and 30 minutes later we moved to the promised room, even though they still need to add the extra bed.

Later that night around 11PM, I starting to hear some people sing so loud from the ground floor (our room is on the 3rd floor) and it was very disturbing as I cannot sleep because of that. I called the front office and they told me that they have live acoustic music held on the ground floor. I've told them that it's already late and people needs to rest. How can we sleep & rest while there is a live acoustic music nearby? It took me to call the front office twice before the music stops 15 minutes later. Such a unprofessional things to have a live music late at night in the open space instead of closed room where every guests can hear the sound while they are trying to go to sleep.

If you are going to stay at Vega Hotel, please make sure on your booking date(s) they don't have any live music scheduled. And if they have, do ask them at what time the live music will be held. Otherwise, it can disturbing you while you are trying to get some rest at night.

Nice & friendly staff though.

I guess it will our last option to stay again here if we want to book a hotel room in Sorong in the future.
title: CAN'T SLEEP BECAUSE OF LIVE ACOUSTIC MUSIC IN THE MIDDLE OF THE NIGHT!!!

text:
If I were to rate the hotel on the room and amenities  on their own merit, I would have chosen 3/5. The hotel is probably the newest but does show some wear. 
I had booked through Expedia/Ultimate Rewards and was later told the hotel was having issues with those reservations resulting in overbookings. Luckily I had arrived early in the day and was not turned away as some other guests were.

Because of the overbooking issue, my original room class was not available so I was updated to a Royal Deluxe. Roomy and quite comfortable though there was a distinctive smell of smoke despite the room being Non Smoking.

My room was on the 5th floor and there was an event on the 6th. Sound insulation is minimal so I could hear a lot of the goings on but the event shut down around 10pm so not a huge deal unless you are an early sleeper.

I should add that the pool area looked nice and the gym was much bigger than I expected though I could not use it.

That said, the reason Vega Hotel scores 5/5 for me is customer service. I arrived the day after I needed to get stitches on the back of my neck at a Manado Hospital ER.  Not the type of event anyone should have to endure, especially in Indonesia, on vacation.
Being solo and not speaking Bahasa, I was left a bit clueless about aftercare and the stitching itself was not the best so I was concerned.
Novi, the manager was amazing. She was incredibly helpful in me procuring medical supplies via their shuttle and when I felt the need to get a second opinion, she offered to accompany me to a local hospital where she helped translate and facilitate the visit. 
Above and beyond the call of duty and left me feeling much better about continuing my vacation.

Just for that, I would return and recommend Vega.
Thank you again Novi.
title: Top marks solely for customer service

text:
We spent a night here after a trip to the Raja Ampat Islands. It’s a nice enough hotel and room although when my partner accidentally knocked a glass from the bathroom sink we were charged 100,000 IDR for the resulting breakage! You would think that if such items are so expensive in Sorong they would consider plastic cups. Either that or it’s a money-making ploy as is the restaurant almost refusing to allow us to partake in the buffet and insisting we need to order a la carte. Not impressed. 

Ps. Being so bemused and unhappy about the extortionate breakage charge I nearly forgot to mention the rat we saw running across the floor of the bar as we were eating dinner!
title: Disgraceful breakages policy!

text:
Stayed in this hotel because we had to stay an additional night in Sorong before flying home after diving in Raja Ampat. The main reason for choosing this hotel was that it is very close to the airport (not even takes 5 minutes by car). All the rest is quite average and there is not much around to do.
Staff is friendly, rooms are okay. Problems we had with the elevator and the food.
Only one out of two elevators was working so we had to wait quite long a few times.
For the food we first had a look at the buffet but then decided to better use the a-la-carte in the evening. We tried to have some mix with Indonesian and western food but the western food we like to have was not available (fried calamari and pizza).
title: Just good enough for an overnight stay

located very close to the DEO airport of sorong, in fact you can walk from/to airport if not bring a lot of luggage. sadly transport from/to airport cost 100 K IDR one way which too expensive considering the distance. it will be good if hotel could provide free airport shuttle to hotel guest just like any other aeroport hotel in big city. 

the hotel itself quite new, clean and with complete facilities like swimming pool

 breakfast is vary also with a lot of choices. best deal. will stay here again for short transit to/from raja ampat. please provide free airport shuttle service, it will attract more guest to stay in this hotel.

text:
Отличное расположение- 7 мин от аэропорта! После хоумстеев на Раджа Ампат и внешнего вида Соронга из окна ржавого такси, это просто дворец за забором. Понравилось все кроме странного обслуживания персонала. До бассейна не добрались, но из окна он был не плох. Рум сервис с едой и напитками-твердая 4. Очень порадовали завтраки. 
Из негативчика.
 При заселении дали номер, в душе не сливалась вода. Позвонили на рецепшен. Через мин 10 пришел мастер провозился минут 10 сказал , что воду слил и собрался уходить. При вопросе, а как мыться, он сейчас опять пойдет через край , ответил сейчас придет...прошло еще минут 15. Звоним на рецепшен. Говорят сейчас найдут мастера и перезвонят . Проходит мин 10.... Звоним на рецепшен, предлагаем сами поменять нам номер....Говорят сейчас перезвонят....Через 5 мин меняют номер, все культурно предложили варианты...все ок. По итогу примерно час тусоваться в ожидании непонятно чего.... 
В холле 2 девушки типа предлагают массаж. На вопросы на инглише они не отвечают, тк то ли не понимают, то ли смена закончилась-встали и ушли. 
В первом номере все на одного человека-тапки, кружка, чай, кофе. Во втором все ок.
Грязноватые стены. Но в целом все отлично.
title: После хоумстеев на Раджа Ампат и внешнего вида Соронга из окна ржавого такси, это просто дворец за забором.

text:
夫婦で1週間ほど滞在しました。
スタッフは気が利くし、親切。
車の手配などもすぐにしてもらえて、料金も良心的でした。
レストランの料理もとても良かったです。
シェフの腕前にはフランス人の夫も満足、もちろん私もです。
朝食は6時からですが、6時に行くと、すでに全部準備ができており、完璧。
空港に車を6時半出発で頼んでいましたが、おかげさまでゆっくり朝食も取れ助かりました。
また、Sorongに滞在の折にはぜひ利用したいと思います。
title: 空港近、おすすめ!

text:
Hotel luxueux pour sorong, chambre propre, lit confortable, belle salle de bain.
Petit déjeuner avec beaucoup de choix.
Le chef du restaurant est très sympas et cuisine vraiment très bien il nous a fait ses spéciales pâtes qui été très bonnes ! un indonésien qui a voyage et travaillé en Europe et qui reproduit ce qu'il a appris en indonésie et ça fait du bien de manger de la bonne bouffe européenne :) Le chef était vraiment très accueillant souriant et aimable.

Le gros bémol est que pour un hôtel 4 étoiles c'est une honte de pas avoir un service de bus pour l'aéroport qui est à moins de 1km de l'hôtel !! vous êtes obligés de prendre un taxi extérieure à l'hôtel et payé 100000 rupiah pour 1 min de trajet ! c'est hors de prix ! à se dire qu'ils adorent vraiment faire de l'argent sur le dos des touristes ! très décevant à cause de ça...
title: Sympas
